end_message: Interview mein hissa lene ka shukriya!
S3: Aap ki jins kya hai? Mard — 1, Aurat — 2
S9: Barah-e-karam yeh bataiye ke aap ke gharanay ke maashi sarbarah ne kahan tak taleem hasil ki?
S10: Barah-e-karam yeh bataiye ke aap ke gharanay ke sarbarah ka pesha kya hai?
S5: Barah-e-karam yeh batayein ke aap zyada tar kis tarah ke biscuit khatay/khati hain? Sandwich Biscuit, Saada Biscuit, Namkeen Biscuit, ya Doosra?
S6: Barah-e-karam yeh batayein ke aap Sandwich Biscuit kis kasrat se khatay/khati hain? Hafte mein 1 ya is se zyada, Mahine mein 2 se 3 dafa, Is se bhi zyada arsay mein, ya Nahi khata/khati?
S7: Barah-e-karam yeh batayein ke aap ne kin kin brands ke Sandwich Biscuit khaye hain? Eclipse Biscuit, Prince Biscuit, Rio Biscuit, Lemon ya Chocolate Sandwich Biscuit, ya Doosra?
S8: Barah-e-karam yeh batayein ke aap ne pichlay 3 mahine mein Eclipse Biscuit khaya hai? Taqreeban 3–4 mahine se pehle khatay thay, Ji haan khatay hain, ya Nahi khaya kabhi?
S8a: Agar aap ne Eclipse Biscuit nahi khaya, to barah-e-karam batayein ke aap ne iska alternative kaun sa biscuit brand adopt kiya?
S8b: Agar aap Eclipse Biscuit nahi khatay aur kisi doosray brand ka intikhab kiya hai, to barah-e-karam batayein ke aap is brand ko kyun use karte hain?
Q1: Barah-e-karam batayein ke aap ne aakhri dafa jo biscuit khaya, uska zahiri rang o shakal aap ko kaisa laga? 1 se 7 ke scale par rate karein — jahan 1 ka matlab hai Bilkul bhi pasand nahi aaya aur 7 ka matlab hai Bohat pasand aaya.
Q4b: Barah-e-karam batayein ke aap ne aakhri dafa jo biscuit khaya, uska rang aap ki pasand ke mutabiq kaisa tha? 1 ka matlab hai Meri pasand se bohat halka, aur 5 ka matlab hai Meri pasand se bohat gehra.
Q5b: Barah-e-karam batayein ke aap ne aakhri dafa jo biscuit khaya, uska size aap ki pasand ke mutabiq kaisa tha? 1 ka matlab hai Meri pasand se bohat chhota, aur 5 ka matlab hai Meri pasand se bohat bara.
Q6a: Barah-e-karam batayein ke aap ne aakhri dafa jo biscuit khaya, usay majmuei tor par aap ko kaisa laga? 1 se 9 ke scale par, jahan 1 ka matlab hai Bilkul bhi pasand nahi aaya aur 9 ka matlab hai Bohat pasand aaya.
Q6b: Agar aap ne mehsoos kiya ke yeh biscuit pasand nahi aaya, to barah-e-karam batayein ke kyun? Tafseel se bayan karein.
Q7a: Barah-e-karam batayein ke aap ne aakhri dafa jo biscuit khaya, uska zaiqa aap ko kis had tak pasand aaya? 1 se 7 ke scale par, jahan 1 ka matlab hai Bilkul bhi pasand nahi aaya aur 7 ka matlab hai Bohat pasand aaya.
Q7b: Agar aap ne mehsoos kiya ke zaiqa pasand nahi aaya, to barah-e-karam batayein ke kyun? Tafseel se bayan karein.
Q9b: Barah-e-karam batayein ke aap ne aakhri dafa jo biscuit khaya, uski mithaas aap ki pasand ke mutabiq kaisi thi? 1 ka matlab hai Meri pasand se bohat kam, aur 5 ka matlab hai Meri pasand se bohat zyada.
Q10b: Barah-e-karam batayein ke aap ne aakhri dafa jo biscuit khaya, uski khushtagi aap ki pasand ke mutabiq kaisi thi? 1 ka matlab hai Meri pasand se bohat kam khushk, aur 5 ka matlab hai Meri pasand se bohat zyada khushk.
Q13: Ab main aap se aakhri dafa jo biscuit khaya, uski price ke hawale se kuch sawalat poochunga. Agar yeh product 2 biscuit ke pack mein 30 Rs mein dastiyab ho, to kya aap ise kharidenge? Ji haan kharidunga/gi — 1, Nahi kharidunga/gi — 2, Shayad / Kuch keh nahi sakta — 3
Q15: Yeh packaging dekh kar kya lag raha hai ke yeh kis cheez ki packaging hai? Yeh kisi biscuit brand ki packaging lag rahi hai — 1, Yeh kisi cake brand ki packaging lag rahi hai — 2, Yeh kisi chocolate bar ki packaging lag rahi hai — 3, Yeh kisi sweets/confectionery item ki packaging lag rahi hai — 4, Samajh nahi aa raha ke kis cheez ki packaging hai — 5, ya Deegar — 6
Q15a: Agar aap ne kaha ke yeh biscuit brand ki packaging nahi lag rahi, to hum is mein kya behtar karein taake yeh biscuit brand ki packaging lage? Rang zyada dilkash/numayan kiye ja sakte hain — 1, Biscuit ki tasveer wazeh ya badi ho sakti hai — 2, Design mein tabdeeli ya pattern barhaya ja sakta hai — 3, Brand ka naam ya logo zyada numayan hona chahiye — 4, Packing par flavor ya type wazeh likha hona chahiye — 5, Kuch bhi behtar karne ki zarurat nahi — 6, ya Deegar — 7
Q15b: Agar aap ne kaha ke yeh biscuit brand ki packaging lag rahi hai, to barah-e-karam batayein ke kis qisam ke biscuit ki packaging lag rahi hai?
Q17: In dono mein se kaun si packaging aap ke biscuit kharidne ke faislay par zyada asar andaz karti hai? Aur kyun?
